feats.benefit: When you’re bloodied, you gain a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls.
feats.name: Dragonborn Fury

feats.benefit: Your healing surge value is equal to one-quarter of your maximum hit points + your Constitution modifier.
feats.name: Draconic Heritage

feats.benefit: You can use _dragon breath_ as an encounter power.
feats.name: Dragon Breath

powers.attack: Strength + 2 vs. Reflex, Constitution + 2 vs. Reflex, or Dexterity + 2 vs. Reflex
powers.damageTypes: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison
powers.flavor: As you open your mouth with a roar, the deadly power of your draconic kin blasts forth to engulf your foes.
powers.name: Dragon Breath

sections.title: Hit
sections.content:
1d6 + Constitution modifier damage.

Increase to +4 bonus and 2d6 + Constitution modifier damage at 11th level, and to +6 bonus and 3d6 + Constitution modifier damage at 21st level.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: When you create your character, choose Strength, Constitution, or Dexterity as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. You also choose the power’s damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. These two choices remain throughout your charac- ter’s life and do not change the power’s other effects.

feats.benefit: +5 racial bonus to saving throws against poison.
feats.name: Cast-Iron Stomach

feats.benefit: You can use your second wind as a minor action instead of a standard action.
feats.name: Dwarven Resilience

feats.benefit: You gain proficiency with the throwing hammer and the warhammer.
feats.name: Weapon Proficiency

feats.benefit: You move at your normal speed even when it would normally be reduced by armor or a heavy load. Other effects that limit speed (such as difficult terrain or magical effects) affect you normally.
feats.name: Encumbered Speed

feats.benefit:
When an effect forces you to move—through a pull, a push, or a slide—you can move 1 square less than the effect specifies. This means an effect that normally pulls, pushes, or slides a target 1 square does not force you to move unless you want to.

In addition, when an attack would knock you prone, you can immediately make a saving throw to avoid falling prone.
feats.name: Stand Your Ground

feats.benefit: You gain training in one additional skill.
feats.name: Eladrin Education

feats.benefit: You gain proficiency with the longsword.
feats.name: Weapon Proficiency

feats.benefit:
You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Will defense.

In addition, you gain a +5 racial bonus to saving throws against charm effects.
feats.name: Eladrin Will

feats.benefit: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.
feats.name: Fey Origin

feats.benefit: Rather than sleep, eladrin enter a meditative state known as trance. You need to spend 4 hours in this state to gain the same benefits other races gain from taking a 6-hour extended rest. While in a trance, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.
feats.name: Trance

feats.benefit: You can use _fey step_ as an encounter power.
feats.name: Fey Step

powers.flavor: With a step, you vanish from one place and appear in another.
powers.name: Fey Step

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Teleport up to 5 squares (see “Teleportation,” PHB page 286).

feats.benefit: You gain proficiency with the longbow and the shortbow.
feats.name: Weapon Proficiency

feats.benefit: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.
feats.name: Fey Origin

feats.benefit: You grant non-elf allies within 5 squares of you a +1 racial bonus to Perception checks.
feats.name: Group Awareness

feats.benefit: You ignore difficult terrain when you shift (even if you have a power that allows you to shift multiple squares).
feats.name: Wild Step

feats.benefit: You can use _elven accuracy_ as an encounter power.
feats.name: Elven Accuracy

powers.flavor: With an instant of focus, you take careful aim at your foe and strike with the legendary accuracy of the elves.
powers.name: Elven Accuracy

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Reroll an attack roll. Use the second roll, even if it’s lower.

feats.benefit: At 1st level, you choose an at-will power from a class different from yours. You can use that power as an encounter power.
feats.name: Dilettante

feats.benefit: You can take feats that have either elf or human as a prerequisite (as well as those specifi- cally for half-elves), as long as you meet any other requirements.
feats.name: Dual Heritage

feats.benefit: You grant allies within 10 squares of you a +1 racial bonus to Diplomacy checks.
feats.name: Group Diplomacy

feats.benefit:
You gain a +5 racial bonus to saving throws
against fear.
feats.name: Bold

feats.benefit: You gain a +2 racial bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.
feats.name: Nimble Reaction

feats.benefit: You can use second chance as an encounter power.
feats.name: Second Chance

powers.flavor: Luck and small size combine to work in your favor as you dodge your enemy’s attack.
powers.name: Second Chance

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: When an attack hits you, force an enemy to roll the attack again. The enemy uses the second roll, even if it’s lower.

feats.benefit: You know one extra at-will power from your class.
feats.name: Bonus At-Will Power

feats.benefit: You gain a bonus feat at 1st level. You must meet the feat’s prerequisites.
feats.name: Bonus Feat

feats.benefit: You gain training in one additional skill from your class skill list.
feats.name: Bonus Skill

feats.benefit: +1 to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will defenses.
feats.name: Defense Bonuses

feats.benefit: You gain a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls against bloodied foes.
feats.name: Bloodhunt

feats.benefit: You have resist fire 5 + one-half your level.
feats.name: Fire Resistance

feats.benefit: You can use _infernal wrath_ as an encounter power.
feats.name: Infernal Wrath

powers.flavor: You call upon your furious nature to improve your odds of harming your foe.
powers.name: Infernal Wrath

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You can channel your fury to gain a +1 power bonus to your next attack roll against an enemy that hit you since your last turn. If your attack hits and deals damage, add your Charisma modifier as extra damage.

feats.benefit: +2 to a skill of your choice.
feats.name: Skill Bonus

feats.benefit: You can communicate telepathically with any creature within 5 squares of you that has a language.
feats.name: Telepathy

feats.benefit: You have resist 5 psychic. The resis­ tance increases to 10 at 11 th level and 15 at 21 st level.
feats.name: Crystalline Mind

feats.benefit: You are a living construct. You don't need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep. You never have to make Endurance checks to resist the effects of starvation, thirst, or suffocation.
feats.name: Living Construct

feats.benefit: You are native to the Astral Sea, so you are considered an immortal creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.
feats.name: Immortal Origin

feats.benefit: You have the shard swarm power.
feats.name: Shard Swarm

feats.benefit: You have the construct keyword, so you are considered to be a construct for effects that relate to that keyword.
feats.name: Construct

feats.benefit:
As a living construct, you have the following traits.

* You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage.
* You can us attached components and embedded components made for warforged (see Equipment, page 32).
* You don’t need to eat, drink, or breathe, but this doesn’t render you immune to any effect.
* Rather than sleep, warforged spend 4 hours refraining from any strenuous activity. You need to spend 4 hours in this state to gain the same benefits other races gain from taking a 6-hour extended rest. While resting in this low-exertion state, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.
* When reduced to 0 hit points, you are less likely to die. When you make a death saving throw, you can take the better of your die roll or 10. You still die at the normal negative hit point total.
feats.name: Living Construct

feats.benefit: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Will defense.
feats.name: Warforged Mind

feats.benefit: You can use Warforged Resolve as an encounter power.
feats.name: Warforged Resolve

powers.flavor: It’s difficult to take you down, even when you’re faltering.
powers.name: Warforged Resolve

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level. You may make an immediate saving throw against one effect that inflicts ongoing damage and can be ended with a save. In addition, if you are bloodied you regain hit points equal to 3 + one half your level.

feats.benefit: You have a +1 bonus to all defenses against attacks made by bloodied creatures.
feats.name: Astral Majesty

feats.benefit: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage equal to 5 + one-half your level.
feats.name: Astral Resistance

feats.benefit: Your spirit is native to the Astral Sea, so you are considered an immortal creature for the purposes of effects that relate to creature origin.
feats.name: Immortal Origin

powers.trigger: You make an attack roll, a saving throw, a skill check, or an ability check and dislike the result.
powers.flavor: The dreamlike memories of your previous lives lend insight to aid you.
powers.name: Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You add 1d6 to the triggering roll.

feats.benefit: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.
feats.name: Fey Origin

feats.benefit: Once per encounter, you can use the wizard cantrip ghost sound (_Player’s Handbook_, page 158) as a minor action.
feats.name: Master Trickster

feats.benefit: If you have any cover or concealment when you make an initiative check, you can make a Stealth check.
feats.name: Reactive Stealth

feats.benefit: You have a +5 racial bonus to saving throws against illusions.
feats.name: Trickster’s Cunning

powers.flavor: You turn invisible in response to harm.
powers.name: Fade Away

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You are invisible until you attack or until the end of your next turn.

feats.benefit: You have a +1 racial bonus to Will.
feats.name: Mountain’s Tenacity

feats.benefit: When you make an Athletics check to jump or climb, roll twice and use either result.
feats.name: Powerful Athlete

powers.flavor: Your foes’ attacks bounce off your stony hide.
powers.name: Stone’s Endurance

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

_Level 11_: Resist 10 to all damage.
_Level 21_: Resist 15 to all damage.

feats.benefit: The first time you are bloodied during an encounter, you gain 5 temporary hit points. The temporary hit points increase to 10 at 11th level and to 15 at 21st level.
feats.name: Half-Orc Resilience

feats.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to speed when charging.
feats.name: Swift Charge

powers.flavor: Your monstrous wrath burns inside you, giving strength to your attack.
powers.name: Furious Assault

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it’s a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it isn’t.

powers.flavor: Your monstrous wrath burns inside you, giving strength to your attack.
powers.name: Furious Assault

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it's a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it isn't.

powers.flavor: You unleash the beast within and take on a savage countenance.
powers.name: Longtooth Shifting

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls. In addition, while you are bloodied, you gain regeneration 2.

_Level 11_: Regeneration 4.
_Level 21_: Regeneration 6.

powers.flavor: You unleash the beast within and take on a savage countenance.
powers.name: Razorclaw Shifting

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Until the end of the encounter, your speed increases by 2, and you gain a +1 bonus to AC and Reflex.

feats.benefit: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.
feats.name: Fey Origin

feats.benefit: Rather than sleep, drow enter a meditative state known as trance. You need to spend 4 hours in this state to gain the same benefits other races gain from taking a 6-hour extended rest. While in a trance, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.
feats.name: Trance

feats.benefit: Once per encounter, you can use either the _cloud of darkness_ power or the _darkfire_ power.
feats.name: Lolthtouched

powers.flavor: A shroud of blackness descends around you, hiding you from sight.
powers.name: Cloud of Darkness

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: The burst creates a cloud of darkness that remains in place until the end of your next turn. The cloud blocks line of sight, squares within it are totally obscured, and creatures entirely within it are blinded until they exit. You are immune to these effects.

powers.attack: Intelligence +4 vs. Reflex, Wisdom +4 vs. Reflex, or Charisma +4 vs. Reflex. Increase to +6 bonus at 11th level and +8 bonus at 21st level.
powers.flavor: A flickering halo of purple light surrounds the target, making it easier to hit.
powers.name: Darkfire

sections.title: Hit
sections.content: Until the end of your next turn, all attacks against the target have combat advantage, and the target cannot benefit from invisibility or concealment.

sections.title: Special
sections.content: When you create your character, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability score you use when making attack rolls with this power. This choice remains throughout your character’s life and does not change the power’s other effects.

feats.benefit: Your ancestors were native to the Elemental Chaos, so you are considered an elemen- tal creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.
feats.name: Elemental Origin

feats.benefit:
Choose one elemental manifestation: earthsoul, firesoul, stormsoul, water- soul, or windsoul. That manifestation is part of your nature. (The Extra Manifestation feat, page 133, lets you add additional manifestations and change your manifestation.) Each elemental manifestation offers particular benefits and provides an associated encounter power. Your appearance changes based on the element you are manifesting.

_Earthsoul_: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Fortitude defense, a +1 racial bonus to saving throws, and the _earthshock power_.

_Firesoul_: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Reflex defense, resist 5 fire, and the _firepulse_ power.
At 11th level, the resistance improves to 10 fire. At 21st level, the resistance improves to 15 fire.

_Stormsoul_: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Fortitude defense, resist 5 lightning, and the _promise of storm power_.
At 11th level, the resistance improves to 10 lightning.
At 21st level, the resistance improves to 15 lightning.

_Watersoul_: You can breathe underwater. You also gain a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage and the _swiftcurrent power_.

_Windsoul_: You gain resist 5 cold and the _windwalker power_.
At 11th level, the resistance improves to 10 cold. At 21st level, the resistance improves to 15 cold.
feats.name: Elemental Manifestation

feats.benefit: You are a shapechanger; you can alter your appearance. As such, you are subject to effects and conditions that affect shapechangers.
feats.name: Shapechanger

feats.benefit: You have a +1 racial bonus to Will.
feats.name: Mental Defense

powers.flavor: You alter your form to look like another person.
powers.name: Changeling Disguise

sections.title: Effect
sections.content:
You alter your physical form to take on the appearance of any Medium humanoid. You retain your statistics in your new form, and your clothing, armor, and possessions do not change. The new form lasts until you change form again.

Any creature that attempts to see through your ruse makes an Insight check opposed by your Bluff check, and you gain a +5 bonus to your check.

powers.flavor: Your feint tricks a foe into giving you an advantage.
powers.name: Changeling Trick

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: You make a Bluff check opposed by the target's passive Insight. If your check succeeds, you gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

feats.benefit: At the start of your turn, you can make a saving throw against each effect currently rendering you dazed or dominated. If you fail the saving throw, you do not make a saving throw against the effect at the end of your turn.
feats.name: Dual Soul

powers.target: You and each ally in burst
powers.trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with an attack against your Will
powers.flavor: You erect a psychic shield to protect your mind from assault, and you ward your allies as well.
powers.name: Bastion of Mental Clarity

sections.title: Effect
sections.content: Each target gains a +4 power bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.
